rooms.Name: Atop a tall rock outcropping
rooms.Description:
You stand before a shimmering rainbow, upon a rock outcropping
that overlooks the desert trail to Agrabah. Even now, just gazing at
this rainbow, you are overcome with a feeling of awe, and the sense
that what you see before you is not fully natural...
Around and below you are cacti, stones, and a few desert flowers.

Exits.Description: The rainbow extends above you, fading out of existence only meters away.

A beautiful desert scene is before you, with flowers and small
recent rain puddles all around. There is also a trail you can
go down to. It leads to Agrabah.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The rainbow softly glows with beams of light, in colours that defie 
description.

The rainbow before you glows softly with ambient light, in colours
that defy description now that you are so close to it. It shimmers
and pulses, and tiny motes of light orbit and swirl around it and
you, like miniature constellations drifting upon an unfelt wind...

You see a small inscription carved upon one of the yellowish stones.
The chiseled in area has been rubbed in with black soot to give it
definition. It says, 'Revamp by Raul'.

rooms.Name: Upon the rainbow
rooms.Description:
You are standing upon the rainbow, surrounded by many shifting beams
of multicoloured light. Through the bottom of the rainbow you can make out
the desert trail, and you have a glimpse of the distant city of
Agrabah.

Exits.Description: The rainbow extends far above you, slowly fading into darkness.
Below you, at the base of the rainbow, is a rock promontory.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The rainbow softly glows with beams of light, in colours that defie 
description.

rooms.Name: On the rainbow
rooms.Description:
You are standing high up on the rainbow, surrounded by many shifting
beams of multicoloured light. Through the bottom of the rainbow you
see laid out below, the Great Desert, and also a smaller, yet more
aerial view of the whitewashed walls and palace domes of Agrabah. The
view is breathtaking!

Exits.Description: The rainbow extends far above you, slowly fading into darkness.
The rainbow extends below you towards the land you once knew as home.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The rainbow softly glows with beams of light, in colours that
defie description.

rooms.Name: On the rainbow
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the rainbow, surrounded by many beams of multicoloured
light.  The rainbow extends above and below you as far as you can see.

Exits.Description:
The rainbow extends far above you.  You see a glowing white light at the 
rainbow's end.
The rainbow extends far below you, slowly fading into darkness.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The rainbow brightly glows with beams of light, in colours that defie any
description.

rooms.Name: On the rainbow
rooms.Description:
You are nearing the end of the rainbow. The beams of multicoloured light
have begun to merge and solidify. All around you are glowing starlike
motes of dust. Ahead is a bridge.

Exits.Description:
The rainbow extends above you, merging into a brilliant glowing
bridge.
The rainbow extends far below you, slowly fading into darkness.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The rainbow brilliantly glows with beams of blinding light, in colours that 
sweep together and merge before your eyes.

The star-like motes dance before your eyes.  They are incredibly beautiful yet
intangible -- your hand passes right through them.

The colors of the rainbow seem to converge into a glowing bridge that leads
to a massive white gate.

rooms.Name: The Glowing Bridge at the Rainbow's End
rooms.Description:
After a long climb you have reached the end of the rainbow.  The brilliant
colours have twisted and merged into a beautiful glowing bridge that leads
toward a massive white gate to the north.  All around you is a soft, peaceful 
glow interrupted only by the passing of starlike dust motes before your eyes.

Exits.Description:
The bridge leads on to a massive white gate.  You see a large grey figure
standing there.

The bridge disassociates into a beautiful spectrum of colours that
drop out of sight below you.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The gate towers tens of feet above your heads.  Beyond it is a field of utter
blackness, from which the motes of light seem to issue forth.
The bridge glows with an unearthly light.

The star-like motes dance before your eyes.  They are incredibly beautiful yet
intangible -- your hand passes right through them.

The rainbow seems to be forming directly from the light of the bridge.  It
drops out of sight below you.

rooms.Name: The Astral Gate
rooms.Description:
Here the bridge ends before a massive, pearly-coloured gate beyond
which you can see a field of blackness filled with silvery snake-like
tendrils, stars, and occasional flashes of light.

Exits.Description:
Through the gate you see a massive field of blackness that extends as far
as you can see.

The bridge extends towards the rainbow, which drops out of sight
below you.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The plaque reads: 

Let this gate stand to protect mortal man for all time against the perils of 
the outer planes of existence and the creatures fair and foul that dwell within.

(This zone, the Astral Plane and accompanying githyanki keep, was written by
 Andersen for any standard Merc 2.0 mud.)

You see a huge, glowing gate wrought from an incredibly hard translucent 
material.  Each of the intricately carved bars of this mighty gate are about 
as thick as a man's wrist, rising from the floor to a height of forty feet.  
A plaque is inset into the wall next to one side of the gate.

rooms.Name: Travelling the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You step through the gate, and into another reality...

   You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is very disorienting, although it is not too late to return
through the gate to the south.

Exits.Description: The astral field stretches out in that direction.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral gate leads back to your world.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field stretches off into infinity.
The astral field stretches out into infinity.

ExtraDescs.Description:
From here the pearly-coloured gate seems very small and insubstantial.  Through
its bars you can see the Astral Guardian, protecting your world from the perils
of this plane of existence.

rooms.Name: Travelling the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is very disorienting, and it is difficult to maintain your 
bearings and sense of direction.

Exits.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.

through the astral field.

Exits.Description: You see the endless expanse of the astral field.
You see the infinite expanse of the astral field.
The astral field continues in that direction.

rooms.Name: Far Within the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
Fierce firestorms rage here, you wonder if you continue, that it
will get worse! Here the fabric of the field has become twisted and
warped due to the proximity of another plane of existence. But far
more so... Choose your path with care...

Exits.Description: The astral field leads on into the depths.
The astral field leads on into infinity.
You notice a warped strand leading somewhere else.
The astral field leads on into the depths.
The astral field leads on into infinity.
The astral field stretches out in that direction.

rooms.Name: Deep Within the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You have travelled deep inside the astral field.  Here the fabric of the
field has become twisted and warped due to the proximity of another plane of
existence.  Some of the tendrils of light that line the astral field have been
warped and twisted into portals to other worlds.
   Take care before you step through one -- you might never return.

Exits.Description: The astral field leads on into infinity.
The astral field leads on into the depths.
The astral field leads on into the depths.
The astral field leads on into infinity.
The astral field leads on into infinity.

rooms.Name: Travelling the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You have travelled deep inside the astral field.  Here the fabric of the
field has become twisted and warped due to the proximity of another plane of
existence.  Some of the tendrils of light that line the astral field have been
warped and twisted into portals to other worlds.
   Take care before you step through one -- you might never return.

Exits.Description: The astral field leads on into infinity.
The astral field leads on into the depths.
The astral field leads on into infinity.
The astral field leads on into infinity.
The astral field stretches out into infinity.

rooms.Name: Deep Within the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You have travelled deep inside the astral field.  Here the fabric of the
field has become twisted and warped due to the proximity of another plane of
existence.  Some of the tendrils of light that line the astral field have been
warped and twisted into portals to other worlds.
   Take care before you step through one -- you might never return.

Exits.Description: The astral field leads on into infinity.
The astral field leads on into infinity.
The astral field leads on into the depths.
An unfamiliar place looms ahead, you think...
The astral field leads on into the depths.
The astral field leads on into infinity.
You see more astral material in the distance.

rooms.Name: Travelling the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You have travelled deep inside the astral field.  Here the fabric of the
field has become twisted and warped due to the proximity of another plane of
existence.  Some of the tendrils of light that line the astral field have been
warped and twisted into portals to other worlds.
   Take care before you step through one -- you might never return.

Exits.Description: The astral field leads on into the depths.
The astral field leads on into the depths.
The astral field leads on into the depths.
The astral field leads on into infinity.
You see yourself.
There is a way, and past it, there seems to be more astral field.

rooms.Name: Travelling the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You are standing upon a massive rock floating within the astral plane.
In all directions except at your feet, the field of darkness and
tendrils of light beckon to you. You feel this might be a safe place
to rest... Perhaps.

Exits.Description: You see a glowing portal before you. Perhaps it is too DANGEROUS!
The astral field stretches out in that direction.
A mystic gateway looms before you.
Astral material can been seen in that direction.
The astral field stretches out in that direction.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
There is a clear passage in that direction.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is made from a set of rusting steel plates set deep into the stone.

rooms.Name: A guard station
rooms.Description:
This is a small building just inside the keep.  Doors lead out to the east
and west.  Some small weapons hang on hooks on the walls, for use in defense
of the keep.
   Doors stand in all directions save north.

Exits.Description: You see an iron door which leads out onto a grey stone road.
You see an iron door which leads out onto a grey stone road.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is made from a set of rusting steel plates set deep into the stone.
The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.

rooms.Name: The cobblestone road
rooms.Description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
   The cobblestone road turns to the north, ending to the east at an iron door.

Exits.Description: The grey cobblestones continue.

You see an iron door which leads into a small stone building set into the wall
of the keep.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.

rooms.Name: The cobblestone road
rooms.Description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
   The cobblestone road continues to the north and south.  Doors to the east
and west lead into stone buildings.

Exits.Description: The grey cobblestones continue.
You see a small stone building with a wooden door.
The grey cobblestones continue.
An iron door blocks your entrance into a large stone building.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.
The door is fashioned from many iron plates and set deep into the stone wall.

rooms.Name: The cobblestone road
rooms.Description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
  The cobblestone road turns to the south and continues on to the east.

Exits.Description: The grey cobblestones continue.
The grey cobblestones continue.

rooms.Name: The cobblestone road
rooms.Description:
The ground beneath your feet is uniformly grey cobblestone. A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head. You hear none of the sounds
you would normally associate with a typical city.
The cobblestone road continues east and west. To the north is a massive
stone building, entered through a pair of large silver doors.

Exits.Description: Looming before you is a forbidding pair of metal doors.
The grey cobblestones continue.
The grey cobblestones continue.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The doors are formed from a silvery substance that feels very hard yet almost
slippery to the touch.  They are covered in images in bas-relief, depicting
scenes of combat between humans and strange tentacle-mouthed humanoids.

rooms.Name: The cobblestone road
rooms.Description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
  The cobblestone road continues to the east and west.  A door to the south
leads into a tall stone building.

Exits.Description: The grey cobblestones continue.
You see a tall stone building with a wooden door.
The grey cobblestones continue.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

rooms.Name: The cobblestone road
rooms.Description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
   The cobblestone road turns to the west and continues to the south.  A door
to the north leads into a tall stone building.

Exits.Description: You see a tall stone building with a wooden door.
A small alley leads east.
The grey cobblestones continue.
The grey cobblestones continue.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

rooms.Name: The cobblestone road
rooms.Description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
   The cobblestone road continues to the north and south.  To the east is a
door in a large stone building.

Exits.Description: The grey cobblestones continue.
An iron door blocks your entrance into a large stone building.
The grey cobblestones continue.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

rooms.Name: The cobblestone road
rooms.Description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
   The cobblestone road continues to the north and south.

Exits.Description: The grey cobblestones continue.
The grey cobblestones continue.

rooms.Name: The cobblestone road
rooms.Description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
   The cobblestone road turns to the north and continues on to the west.  To
the east is a door in a large stone building.

Exits.Description: The grey cobblestones continue.
An iron door blocks your entrance into a large stone building.
The grey cobblestones continue.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

rooms.Name: Upon a cobblestone road
rooms.Description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
   The cobblestone road goes on to the east, ending to the west at an iron door.
A door to the north leads into a small stone building.

Exits.Description: You see a small stone building with a wooden door.
The grey cobblestones continue.

You see an iron door which leads into a small stone building set into the wall
of the keep.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.
The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.

rooms.Name: A small building
rooms.Description:
You have stepped inside a dimly lit building, which apparently serves as
living quarters for several githyanki gish.  The walls are heavy stone blocks, 
covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood.  A couple of candles
burn dimly in sconces here and there.

Exits.Description: The wooden door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

rooms.Name: A simple domicile
rooms.Description:
You have stepped inside a dimly lit building, which apparently serves as
living quarters for several githyanki gish.  The walls are heavy stone blocks, 
covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood.  A couple of candles
burn dimly in sconces here and there.

Exits.Description: The wooden door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

rooms.Name: A private domicile
rooms.Description:
You have stepped inside a dimly lit building with vaulted ceilings and high
windows.  The walls are heavy stone blocks that rise tens of feet above your
head, covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood.  On the floor
are charcoal stencils of pentagrams and various other ominous sigils.

Exits.Description: The wooden door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

rooms.Name: The Githyanki Weaponry
rooms.Description:
A large chamber, full of weapons in various states of completion.  Strange
glowing blocks of silvery metal are being pounded and rolled out into deadly 
razor-sharp knives, daggers, and swords.
   Sounds of hammering and blasts of heat and strange smells come from the open
doorway to the north.  An iron door stands to the west.

Exits.Description: You see a massive forgeroom, lit by a white-hot furnace.
The iron door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

rooms.Name: The Forge
rooms.Description:
In the center of the room is a massive furnace which emits great gouts of
heat and a strange smell which comes from the melting of the silvery metal used
by the githyanki.  A large trough of icy water stands to the west, used for 
quenching hot metal.
   Doorways stand to the north and south.  The furnace door lies to the east.

Exits.Description: You see the armoury.
Through the grille in the furnace door you see only flames.
You see the weaponry.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The entire furnace is glowing white-hot to the touch.
The furnace door looks too hot to even attempt to open.

rooms.Name: The Githyanki Armoury
rooms.Description:
A large chamber, full of suits of armor in various states of completion.  In
this chamber the hard steels of the githyanki are shaped into ornately fashioned
suits of mail.
   Sounds of hammering and blasts of heat and strange smells come from the open
doorway to the south.  An iron door stands to the west.

Exits.Description: You see a massive forgeroom, lit by a white-hot furnace.
The iron door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

rooms.Name: Inside the furnace
rooms.Description:
You gasp for breath and choke on toxic sulphur and brimstone.  The sweat
on your forehead is instantly vaporized by the flames that surround you.  You
begin to feel faint and dizzy from the heat...

... you'd better leave before you pass out and burn to a cinder!

Exits.Description: The flames blind you and obscure your vision.
The flames blind you and obscure your vision.
The flames blind you and obscure your vision.

rooms.Name: The prison guard station
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a small, fairly empty building that serves as the prison
for the keep.  The building is small because the githyanki do not make a habit 
of taking prisoners, and those that they do capture do not last long.
   The cellblock lies to the west and the grey stone road is to the east.

Exits.Description: You see an iron door which leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.
You see the cellblock.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is fashioned from many iron plates and set deep into the stone wall.

rooms.Name: The cellblock
rooms.Description:
A torch flickers in the western wall, providing some illumination for this
dim corridor.  Some whips, manacles, and chains hang on the walls -- they seem
to have been used recently.
   Cell doors stand to the north and south.  The guard station is to the east.

Exits.Description: You see a small cell.
You see the guard station.
You see a small cell.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass
food underneath to the prisoner.

rooms.Name: A cramped cell
rooms.Description:
You are in a tiny, cold, dank cell.
  The only exit is back through the door to the south.

Exits.Description: You see the cellblock.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass
food underneath to the prisoner.

rooms.Name: A tiny cell
rooms.Description:
You are in a cold, dank, cramped cell.
   The only exit is back throught the door to the north.

Exits.Description: You see the cellblock.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass
food underneath to the prisoner.

rooms.Name: An expansive domicile
rooms.Description:
You have stepped inside a dimly lit building with vaulted ceilings and high
windows.  The walls are heavy stone blocks that rise tens of feet above your
head, covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood.  On the floor
are charcoal stencils of pentagrams and various other ominous sigils.

Exits.Description: The wooden door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

ExtraDescs.Description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

rooms.Name: South End of the Hall
rooms.Description:
This is a massive stone hall, lit by flaming blue stones set into the walls.
Massive suits of armor line the walls, holding weapons fashioned from a strange
silvery metal.
   The great hall continues to the north and ends in a pair of huge metal doors
to the south.

Exits.Description: The great hall continues to the north.
The metal doors lead out onto the grey cobblestone road.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The doors are formed from a silvery substance that feels very hard yet almost
slippery to the touch.  They are covered in images in bas-relief, depicting
scenes of combat between humans and strange tentacle-mouthed humanoids.
Massive pole arms, spears, mighty swords, all kinds of death-dealing devices.
The suits of armor are very intricately and ornately fashioned splint mail.

rooms.Name: North End of the Hall
rooms.Description:
This is a massive stone hall, lit by flaming blue stones set into the walls.
Massive suits of armor line the walls, holding weapons fashioned from a strange
silvery metal.
   The great hall continues to the south.  An archway leads into a dimly lit
room to the north.

Exits.Description: You think you can see some steps leading up to an altar...
The great hall continues to the south.

ExtraDescs.Description: The archway is shrouded in a strange black mist that obscures your vision.
Massive pole arms, spears, mighty swords, all kinds of death-dealing devices.
The suits of armor are very intricately and ornately fashioned splint mail.

rooms.Name: The Altar Chamber
rooms.Description:
Your eyes have trouble adjusting to the dim lighting.  All around you are
columnar statues of githyanki turned towards the altar standing at the top
of a series of steps.

Exits.Description: The steps lead north and up to a massive sacrificial altar.
You think you can see the hall.

ExtraDescs.Description: The archway is shrouded in a strange black mist that obscures your vision.

rooms.Name: Before the Altar
rooms.Description:
You have climbed the mighty steps of the alter chamber, and now stand
before the stone alter used to offer tribute to Lord Gish, long-dead
ruler of the githyanki. The altar is covered in blood that drips into
dark holes... You feel an incredible nausea as evil washes over you.

Exits.Description: The steps lie to the south, leading back down to the altar chamber floor.
The floor of the altar is pockmarked with small holes, draining blood.

ExtraDescs.Description: The altar is a huge sacrificial altar covered in bloodstains.
The stains of blood run down off the altar towards your feet, oozing quietly.
The holes have passed countless amounts of blood down below the altar.

rooms.Name: A Gateway to the Underworld
rooms.Description:
You step through the tiny hole in the altar, and stand before a swirling
field of blackness.  Through the field you can hear the howls of lost souls
and long-dead beings.

Exits.Description: You see the altar chamber.

You look down into the field of blackness, and feel a tangible wave of evil wash
over you.  Stepping into the field would be a bad idea.

ExtraDescs.Description: The blood drips from above your head and falls through the field...

The field pulses and feeds on the blood dripping from above.

A tangible wave of hatred washes over you, striking fear into your very soul.

rooms.Name: Utter darkness and despair
rooms.Description:
It is pitch black...

  You are overwhelmed by the sensation of death and horrible pain as a shape
begins to coalesce before you.

rooms.Name: A deserted alley
rooms.Description:
This alleyway looks abandoned, and might just be a safe place to rest,
away from all those evil giths. Long shadows conceal everything in
darkness.
  You notice a small grate hidden under a pile of rubbish.

Exits.Description: The cobblestoned road is to the west.

Managing to clear some of the rubbish, you've discovered a secret
grate!

rooms.Name: A secret hideout
rooms.Description:
Down beneath the alley, you are in a large stone cellar that has
been fitted with a crude teleportational portal. The floor of this
room is wet, and the air smells dank and musty. Aside from the portal
to the east, the room is empty and bare.

Exits.Description:
The portal is of stone, you will have to work hard to work the
levers.
Up past the secret grate is the deserted alley.

rooms.Name: Travelling the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
Floating in the depths of the astral field is this massive rock that
you have managed to discover and land upon. It measures only a few
hundred paces across. The surface is grey, strewn with small craters.

Exits.Description: The astral field stretches out into infinity.
The astral field stretches out into infinity.
The astral field stretches out into infinity.
The astrail field stretches out into infinity.
The astral field stretches out into infinity.
The astral plane stretches out into infinity.
More of the rock.
That direction is blocked by rubble.
The astral plane stretches out into infinity.

rooms.Name: Still in the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You have ventured further from where you once landed, and now approach
a cavern mouth. The ground before you is strewn heavily with rubble.
The cavern mouth is dark. You know not what is before you.

Exits.Description: The Astral Plane stretches off into infinity.
More rock.
A cavemouth looms before you to the south. It looks dark.
The rock disappears over the horizon.
The astral field stretches out into infinity.
More of the rock.
The astral field stretches out into infinity.

rooms.Name: Within the cavern
rooms.Description:
It is dark in here, but as there is no real air in the astral plane,
so also is there no real smell. Good thing too, for there appears
to be all manner of rubbish lying about. North leads outside.

Exits.Description:
Outside the cavemouth is more of the rock, and also the rest of the
astral field.

rooms.Name: Travelling the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is somewhat disorienting.
   All exits lead off into the astral field.

Exits.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

Strange disturbances in that direction lead you to wonder if there
is any danger...
Careful now!
The astral field leads off into infinity.

It might be dangerous, it might not...
Be careful, as always.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
There might be danger, or there might not.
The astral field leads off into infinity.

rooms.Name: Travelling the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is somewhat disorienting.
   All exits lead off into the astral field.

Exits.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

Strange disturbances in that direction lead you to wonder if there
is any danger...
Careful now!
The astral field leads off into infinity.

It might be dangerous, it might not...
Be careful, as always.

It looks mighty dangerous there... But then, there is no reward with
out a risk...
There might be danger, or there might not.
The astral field leads off into infinity.

rooms.Name: Travelling the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
Fierce astral storms rage here, tendrils of light lashing out at you
with virulent intensity! You find yourself floating within a morass
of swirling light and darkness that challenges your senses to the
limits. The weightlessness of this environment is very disorienting.

Exits.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

Strange disturbances in that direction lead you to wonder if there
is any danger...
Careful now!
There might be danger, or there might not.

It might be dangerous, it might not...
Be careful, as always.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
There might be danger, or there might not.

It looks mighty dangerous there... But then, there is no reward with
out a risk.

rooms.Name: Travelling the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is somewhat disorienting.
   All exits lead off into the astral field.

Exits.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

Strange disturbances in that direction lead you to wonder if there
is any danger...
Careful now!
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.

It might be dangerous, it might not...
Be careful, as always.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
There might be danger, or there might not.
The astral field leads off into infinity.

rooms.Name: Travelling the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is somewhat disorienting.
   All exits lead off into the astral field.

Exits.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field stretches out into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.

It might be dangerous, it might not...
Be careful, as always.
There is a silvery strand...
There might be danger, or there might not.

It might be dangerous, it might not.
Be careful!

rooms.Name: Travelling the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is somewhat disorienting.
   All exits lead off into the astral field.

Exits.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

Strange disturbances in that direction lead you to wonder if there
is any danger...
Careful now!
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.

It might be dangerous, it might not...
Be careful, as always.

A room looms up ahead. That is Very odd in this realm...
Careful now...
There might be danger, or there might not.

rooms.Name: Travelling the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny
tendrils of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust. The
weightlessness of this environment is somewhat disorienting, and you
don't know why, but you have a headache, and with being in the astral
for so long, you experience a sensation of deja vu...

Exits.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.

rooms.Name: Travelling the Astral Plane
rooms.Description:
You have come upon a seemingly calm area of the astral field. You don't
know how long this may last, but will gladly take advantage of any rest
you can find during your travels. A few floating rocks provide excellent
places to sit. All about you the astral field stretches out.

Exits.Description: The astral field stretches out in that direction.
The astral plane stretches out into infinity.
The astral field continues into infinity.
You see more of this astral plane.
The astral field stretches out in that direction.
